title: #130: Dems Feel The Heat On Impeachment, Trump Decimates ISIS, Democrat Resigns Amid Scandal
text: Matt and Storm are back on this tremendous Tuesday! There's so much good news to report today. House Dems are feeling the pressure on impeachment as House Speaker Nancy Pelosi has finally scheduled a House impeachment inquiry vote for Thursday. Over the weekend, President Trump gave the go-ahead for raids against ISIS that resulted in the death of the terrorist organization's leader. The guys also talk resignation of Rep. Katie Hill, which comes more than a week after RedState's excellent reporting.
